title: xDSL HAL Schema
description: xDSL HAL JSON Schema definitions. DO NOT modify the contents of this schema file. RDK community team make necessary changes and release

schemaVersion.description: Supported version of the schema. DO NOT modify the value of the version string. HAL operation cannot be performed without correct supported version.

moduleName.description: Module name to be used in JSON message

action.description: List of action strings that can be used in a JSON message that is exchanged between RDK Manager & Vendor Software.

getParameters.description: Supported parameters of 'getParameters' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client.

getParametersResponse.description: Supported parameters of 'getParametersResponse' action used by Vendor Software JSON HAL server

getSchema.description: The 'getSchema' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client. This action doesn't have any params list.

getSchemaResponse.description: Properties of 'getSchemaResponse' action used by Vendor software JSON HAL server.

setParameters.description: Supported parameters of 'setParameters' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client.

subscribeEvent.description: RDK Manager uses this action to subscribe any event that it wants to receive from the Vendor Software

publishEvent.description: Vendor Software uses this action to publish events that are subscribed by the RDK Manager

resultStatusEnumList.description: Result string for any action that is requested

subscribeEventSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for subscribeEvent and publishEvent actions

setParameterSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for setParameters action

setParameterOptionalList.description: Optional data model parameter list for setParameters action

getParameterSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for getParameters action

getParameterOptionalList.description: Optional data model parameter list for getParameters action

dslDiagnosticsADSLLineTestObjectName.description: This object is to provide diagnostic information for a CPE with an ADSL2 or ADSL2+ modem WAN interface, but MAY also be used for ADSL.

dslDiagnosticsSeltuerObjectName.description: This object contains DSL Single Ended Line Test - Physical Medium Dependent (SELT-PMD) Uncalibrated Echo Response (UER) diagnostics parameters.

dslSeltuerUER.description: The Uncalibrated Echo Response (UER) [a(0),b(0)], [a(1),b(1)], Comma-separated list (1 to 4096 items) of UERComplexs

dslDiagnosticsSeltqlnObjectName.description: This object contains DSL Single Ended Line Test - Physical Medium Dependent (SELT-PMD) Quiet Line Noise (QLN) diagnostics parameters.

dslDiagnosticsSeltpObjectName.description: This object contains DSL Single-Ended Line Test - Processed (SELT-P) diagnostics parameters.

fastLineLinkStatus.description: There is an additional property of 'notificationType' added to this object

atmLinkObjectName.description: An ATM Link entry is typically stacked on top of either a DSL.Channel. or a DSL.BondingGroup. object.

atmLinkVCSearchList.description: Comma-separated list (maximum list length 256) of strings. Ordered list of VPI/VCI pairs to search if a link using the DestinationAddress cannot be established.

ptmLinkObjectName.description: A PTM Link entry is typically stacked on top of either a FAST.Line., DSL.Channel., or a DSL.BondingGroup. object.

description: JSON HAL message format used exchanged between RDK Manager and Vendor Software

allOf.description: Conditional block to include data model parameters based on actions
